com.synacor.zimbra.store.backend

Class HttpBackend

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.synacor.zimbra.store.backend.Backend
      • com.synacor.zimbra.store.backend.HttpBackend
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HcpBackend, S3Backend

    public abstract class HttpBackend
extends Backend
    Base class for HTTP-based object store backends using the built-in HttpClient 3.x pool
